name: LangNet - Talk, Chat & Learn Languages Together
description: Want to hang out with new friends while learning languages? Well, Langnet has a place for you. From real-time newsfeed, comment, chat, video calling to finally live-streaming, and more, finding people is easier and more fun with this Social network.  Simple getting start by posting a topic, asking questions, call to talk with others, or just reply to others topics. Or, if you are a social butterfly, live streaming would satisfy your needs. Furthermore, at Langnet, all of the video calls/live-streamings can be auto-recorded and ready to be share, comment, and replay anytime, anyplace.  The possibility is endless. Whatever your purpose is, Langnet is a recommended app for you to create new connections and have fun with language.  Features: - Unlimited video, audio calls with real-time subtitles. - Chat anytime with your friends, foreigners. - Video, audio calls can be recorded so, you can listen to your real pronunciation later. - Make new friends and chat, call them by English.  - Read English sentences by machine. - Start live streaming audio-only or audio + video.
